question: 牛
sourceMnemonic: The kanji and the word are the same. This word is a bit broader than <vocabulary>cow</vocabulary> though, and can also be used to be <vocabulary>bull</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>ox</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
Since this word is made up of a single kanji, it uses the kun'yomi reading. Here's a mnemonic to help you to remember it: 

You're leading the cows around the field. To get them to move, you yell out "<reading>USH</reading>, USH, USH!" (<ja>うし</ja>) because you have a speech impediment and want to say "MUSH MUSH MUSH." Go ahead and say this out loud, yelling it if you can.
